definitions: in a way that relates to the structure of a building or other item

examples.text: the structurally minimalist domes of the Eden Project in Cornwall
fish skin is structurally different from that of mammals

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to structure of building or other item

definitions: in a way that relates to the arrangement of and relations between the parts or elements of a complex whole

examples.text: how the company develops structurally will change as we go along

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to arrangement of elements of complex whole
